members.name: focus
members.descriptionHtml: Sets focus to a descendant in the Trap Zone. See firstFocusableSelector and focusPreviouslyFocusedInnerElement for details.

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the IFocusTrapZone interface. Use this instead of ref for accessing the public methods and properties of the component.

members.name: disableFirstFocus
members.descriptionHtml: Do not put focus onto first element when render focus trap zone

members.name: elementToFocusOnDismiss
members.descriptionHtml: Sets the HTMLElement to focus on when exiting the FocusTrapZone.
members.defaultValue: The element.target that triggered the FTZ.

members.name: firstFocusableSelector
members.descriptionHtml: Indicates the selector for first focusable item. Only applies if focusPreviouslyFocusedInnerElement == false.

members.name: focusPreviouslyFocusedInnerElement
members.descriptionHtml: Specifies the algorithm used to determine which descendant element to focus when focus() is called. If false, the first focusable descendant, filtered by the firstFocusableSelector property if present, is chosen. If true, the element that was focused when the Trap Zone last had a focused descendant is chosen. If it has never had a focused descendant before, behavior falls back to the first focused descendant.

members.name: forceFocusInsideTrap
members.descriptionHtml: Indicates whether focus trap zone should force focus inside the focus trap zone

members.name: ignoreExternalFocusing
members.descriptionHtml: Indicates if this Trap Zone will ignore keeping track of HTMLElement that activated the Zone.

members.name: isClickableOutsideFocusTrap
members.descriptionHtml: Indicates if this Trap Zone will allow clicks outside the FocusTrapZone
